articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the Fatherland Liberation War Martyrs Cemetery to pay tribute to the fallen fighters of the KPA at 10 a.m. on Sunday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory in the great Fatherland Liberation War.
					 After he arrived at the cemetery, the chief of a guard of honor of the Ground, Naval, Air and Anti-Air Forces of the KPA and the Worker-Peasant Red Guards shouted "Present arms!" in the memory of the fallen fighters.
					
					 A floral basket in the name of Kim Jong Un was placed before the cemetery.
					
					 Also laid before it were floral baskets in the name of the General Staff, General Political Bureau, Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, the services and corps-level units of the KPA and bunches of flowers.
					
					 He together with other visitors paid silent tribute to the fallen fighters.
					
					 He went round the cemetery.
					
					 He said that the victory in the past Fatherland Liberation War is associated with the heroic exploits performed by the known and unknown martyrs who courageously turned out in the battles to defend the country in hearty response to the order of President Kim Il Sung, underscoring the need to respect the participants in the war as revolutionary forerunners and glorify their revolutionary spirit and feats generation after generation.
					
					 He noted that the spirit of defending the country displayed in the period of the great Fatherland Liberation War serves as a valuable mental legacy of the Korean revolution, underlining the need to deeply instill the popular heroism and patriotic spirit displayed by the army and people of the DPRK in the war into the youth and children and people.
					
					 He was accompanied by Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol and other commanding officers of the KPA, executive members of the KPA Committee of the WPK and commanding officers of the services and corps-level units of the KPA.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Performance Given by State Merited Chorus
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, together with KPA service personnel, enjoyed a performance given by the State Merited Chorus at the People's Theatre to celebrate the anniversary of the war victory.
					 He appeared in the auditorium of the theatre.
					
					 He warmly waved back to the cheers of the audience and congratulated them significantly celebrating the day of war victory.
					
					 Put on the stage were male choruses "July 27 March" and "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", orchestra and serial songs "Respects to Victors of Great Years", male duet and male chorus "The General Is Great Defender", male choruses "I Will Remain Your Son Forever" and "Revolutionary Armed Forces Uphold Leadership of Marshal Only".
					
					  The performers truthfully represented the fact that the undying feats performed by President Kim Il Sung in winning the victory in the war will shine long in the history of the country.
					
					 They also sang high praises of leader Kim Jong Il, stressing that under his leadership the DPRK won one victory after another in the fierce confrontation with the U.S. imperialists without gun report.
					
					 They made a truthful artistic presentation replete with high militant spirit of the fact that the army and people of the DPRK are firmly defending the sovereignty of the country and eternally glorifying the history of war victory which started in Mt. Paektu thanks to the gifted wisdom, matchless grit and outstanding leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kim Jong Un congratulated the State Merited Chorus on its successful performance.
					
					 He expressed expectation and conviction that the creators and artistes of the chorus would as ever dynamically conduct revolutionary and militant performing activities and thus more powerfully encourage the army and people of the DPRK in their efforts to bring earlier the final victory in the confrontation with the U.S. and build a thriving nation by dint of the unbreakable great army-people unity.
					
					 Among the audience were Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol and other commanding officers of the KPA, executive members of the KPA Committee of the WPK and commanding officers of the services and corps-level units of the KPA.

articles.title: Foreign Ministry Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Deliberately Linking DPRK to Mideast Disputes
articles.content:
Foreign Ministry Spokesman Accuses U.S. of Deliberately Linking DPRK to Mideast Disputes
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry Monday gave the following answer to the question put by KCNA as regards the fact that the U.S. and its followers are working hard to create anti-DPRK atmosphere by deliberately linking the DPRK to disputes in the Mideast:
					 A local court of the U.S. recently made a ruling that the DPRK was also to blame for the killing of Israelis by Hezbollah in Lebanon as it allegedly provided the organization with missiles and military assistance.
					
					 Meanwhile, Western media are floating a report that a contract on the purchase of missiles and communication equipment worth hundreds of thousands of U.S. dollars is being pushed forward between the DPRK and Hamas of Palestine.
					
					 This is utterly baseless sophism and sheer fiction let loose by the U.S. to isolate the DPRK internationally.
					
					 Lurking behind this propaganda is a sinister intention of the U.S. to justify its criminal acts of backing Israel driven into a tight corner by its recent unethical killings in the Gaza Strip of Palestine.
					
					 At the 21st extraordinary meeting of the UN Human Rights Council the U.S. was the only country that voted against a resolution on the situation in the Gaza Strip in favor of Israel when it was put on voting, becoming a target of international accusation.
					
					 Much upset by this, the U.S. is working hard to deliberately link the DPRK to the so-called "terrorist organizations" defined by it in a bid to divert the focus of international criticism to Pyongyang.
					
					 The U.S. is pulling up others under the pretexts of "terrorism", "killing of civilians" and the like, a gangster-like logic reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The U.S. is a wrecker of global peace and security, kingdom of terrorism and chief culprit of international terrorism as it has supplied war hardware of various types to the south Korean puppet forces and is prodding them to ignite a war against the DPRK.
					
					 With neither lies nor fabrications can the U.S. cover up or falsify truth.

articles.title: Condolences to Algerian President
articles.content:
Condolences to Algerian President
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on July 26 sent a message of condolence to Abdelaziz Bouteflika, president of Algeria, as regards the unexpected crash of an Air Algerie plane which claimed the lives of many people.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the Algerian government and people and the bereaved families.

articles.title: Message of Condolence to Algerian FM
articles.content:
Message of Condolence to Algerian FM
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on July 26 sent a message of condolence to Ramtane Lamamra, foreign minister of Algeria, as regards the crash of an Air Algerie plane which claimed huge casualties.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the bereaved families.

articles.title: Message of Condolence to French FM
articles.content:
Message of Condolence to French FM 
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong on July 26 sent a message of condolence to his French counterpart Laurent Fabius as regards Algeria's recent flight crash which claimed the lives of many French nationals.
					 The message expressed deep sympathy and consolation to the bereaved families.

articles.title: Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
Letter to Kim Jong Un from General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a letter from the General Association of Koreans in China on Sunday, the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 The letter said:
					
					 President Kim Il Sung will always be alive in the hearts of all people as a symbol of the victory in the independent cause against imperialism as he performed the exploits before the country, people, era and history by leading the Fatherland Liberation War to a great victory.
					
					 The exploits he performed by winning the victory in the  war against the U.S. have served as a treasured sword of certain victory and valuable revolutionary treasure that helped the army and people of the DPRK achieve one victory after another in the confrontation with the U.S. for decades.
					
					 Leader Kim Jong Il, penetrating into the situation getting tenser due to the war moves of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces, established the original mode of the Songun politics in all fields as required by the developing revolution and thus consolidated the anti-imperialist military front of the Korean revolution as firm as a rock and provided a powerful war deterrent for self-defense, leading the Korean people in their struggle against the U.S. and imperialism to a new victory.
					
					 Thanks to the invincible Songun leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are shining as eternal treasured sword for the struggle against imperialism and the U.S., and the Korean people will wipe out any aggressor at a stroke by dint of this sword and Korean-style socialism will emerge victorious forever.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Cynical Ploy to Conceal Its True Colors as Provocateur
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. Cynical Ploy to Conceal Its True Colors as Provocateur 
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- A spokesperson for the U.S. Department of State talked rubbish that it was "inappropriate" to link North Korea's firing of tactical rockets with the U.S.-south Korea joint naval maneuvers. 
					 A KCNA commentary dismisses this as foolish remarks to divert elsewhere the world public criticism of the U.S. ceaseless provocative joint military exercises in south Korea and its vicinity.
					
					 The above-said joint war maneuvers which the spokesperson of the U.S. Department of State painted as "annual ones and transparent ones" are war exercises for invading the DPRK and drills for actual nuclear strike at it in name and reality.
					
					 This is evidenced by the operation plans defining the nature of the exercises and the war hardware involved in them.
					
					 The U.S. has staged war exercises with the south Korean puppet army for years on the basis of the war scenarios of five versions for attacking the DPRK, steadily modifying and supplementing them.
					
					The first version is OPLAN 5026 aimed at destroying the DPRK's nuclear facilities by making a two day-long surgical strike. The second one is OPLAN 5027 designed to finish the war in 90 days with huge troops involved  and carry out the plan for prompt and precise strike, etc. They have been steadily modified and supplemented. The third version is OPLAN 5029 to cope with the "collapse" of the DPRK and the last version is OPLAN 8022-02, a combination of a precision nuclear attack and electronic warfare and network attack.
					
					 There are countless scenarios for aggression besides the above-said plans and the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet army have conducted military drills according to these detailed operation plans.
					
					 The implementation of these war scenarios necessarily requires WMDs. In actuality, the U.S. unhesitatingly hurled highly destructive latest military hardware into various forms of war drills staged every year.
					
					 Nuclear carrier George Washington and Aegis destroyer Kidd were involved in the recent naval maneuvers.
					
					 The operation plans of those war maneuvers were aimed at stifling the DPRK and war hardware for offensive and aggression was involved in them. This fact alone clearly proved that their joint military exercises were maneuvers for actual nuclear strikes to put the whole territory of the DPRK under the U.S. control.
					
					 The DPRK can never remain a passive onlooker to the dangerous moves of the hostile forces to invade a sovereign country and reduce it to ashes.
					
					 The DPRK's firing of tactical rockets for self-defence is just whereas the anti-DPRK war moves and hostile policies of the U.S. and its followers are wrong.
					
					 The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can conceal its criminal nature with sheer sophism and call into question the DPRK's acts for  self-defence.
					
					 The validity of the DPRK's military actions for self-defense are being recognized by the world justice and conscience and they bitterly assail the U.S. hostile acts.
					
					 The DPRK will continue bolstering up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the U.S. war moves, and its counter-actions will become annual and regular.
					
					 The U.S. should bear in mind that with nothing can it bar the DPRK from exercising this legitimate right.

articles.title: DPRK Is Sure to Win Final Victory: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK Is Sure to Win Final Victory: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK is sure to win a final victory as there are the solid foundation for building a thriving nation laid by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, the single-minded unity of its service personnel and people who are united close around Marshal Kim Jong Un and the history and tradition of the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in an article.
					 The high dignity and prestige of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea, the independent life of the Korean people and the strong vitality with which they are making a dynamic general advance for the final victory are directly linked with July 27, the day of the war victory, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The Fatherland Liberation War fought in the 1950s was a do-or-die war unprecedented in its ferocity.
					
					 The military idea, strategies and tactics of the President characterized by their originality, scientific accuracy, superb stratagem and offensive spirit were a decisive factor which enabled Korean people to turn the tide of the war in their favor, always seize the initiative and win only victories.
					
					 The Korean peninsula has turned into a region where the danger of a thermonuclear war has become a fait accompli as political and military confrontation has extremely escalated there. But the target of our struggle remains unchanged.
					
					 Under the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un, a peerless illustrious commander, the military muscle of the DPRK has been bolstered up a hundredfold and it has provided a sure guarantee for safeguarding peace and security in not only the peninsula but other parts of Northeast Asia and the rest of the world.
					
					 The more the situation gets complicated, the more dynamically the DPRK will advance along the road chosen by itself with the justice of its cause and firm confidence in victory.
					
					 This is the revolutionary disposition and the tradition of struggle of the service personnel and people of the DPRK who were brought up by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Opens
articles.content:
National Taekwon-Do All-Star Tournament for Jonsung Cup Opens
 Hamhung, July 28 (KCNA) -- A national Taekwon-Do all-star tournament for Jonsung Cup opened with due ceremony in Hamhung City, South Hamgyong Province on Monday on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Aces of the National Taekwon-Do Team and other Taekwon-Do teams, Korea University of Physical Education and Central Physical Training College will compete in Taekwon-Do and Paduk (go) matches.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Thae Jong Su, chief secretary of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Jon Kwang Ho, chairman of the South Hamgyong Provincial People's Committee, officials concerned, sports persons, youth and students.
					
					 Kim Kyong Ho, chairman of the Korean Taekwon-Do Committee, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the opening ceremony there took place demonstrations of players of the South Hamgyong Provincial Taekwon-Do Team.

articles.title: DPRK Statements Distributed as UNSC Official Document
articles.content:
DPRK Statements Distributed as UNSC Official Document
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The statements of the Foreign Ministry of the DPRK and a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK were  distributed as the UNSC official document S/2014/512 on July 24. 
					 The statement of the  Foreign Ministry of the DPRK was released on July 19 as regards the abnormal situation where a serious threat is posed to the peace and security on the Korean Peninsula owing to the U.S. and its followers' moves hostile to  the DPRK and the statement of a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK was issued on July 20 under the title "The U.S. should stop making reckless remarks as regards the DPRK's just measure for bolstering up the capability for self-defence."

articles.title: Scientific Achievements Helpful to Light Industry in DPRK
articles.content:
Scientific Achievements Helpful to Light Industry in DPRK
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has made a lot of scientific achievements in the field of light industry.
					 Those achievements were displayed at an exhibition held some days ago to mark the 60th anniversary of the Branch Academy of Light Industrial Science under the State Academy of Sciences.
					
					 They include the crushed corn production procession and molding machine developed by scientists at the Grain Processing Institute, a new dyeing method invented by the Textile Institute and mixed perfumes and spices for functional soap and food developed by the Aromatic and Cosmetic Engineering Institute.
					
					 Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry presented to the exhibition scores of papers and sci-tech data as well as inventions it has already introduced to production units.

articles.title: Swiss Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Swiss Party Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
						
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Communist Party of Italian-Speaking Region in Switzerland led by Lucchini Alessandro, deputy secretary for political affairs, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary career of the President, the guests looked round the historical relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They toured the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The head of the delegation said:
					
					 The visit provided me an opportunity to know well about the history of the arduous struggle of Comrade Kim Il Sung for the independence of the country.
					
					 He devoted all his life to the country and its people.
					
					 He is the great man who performed undying feats before the times and mankind.
					
					 His revolutionary career serves as a good example of all of us.
					
					 The delegation also visited Kim Il Sung University, International Friendship Exhibition House, Party Founding Museum, Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Arch of Triumph, etc.

articles.title: Army and People of DPRK Visit Kunja Revolutionary Site
articles.content:
Army and People of DPRK Visit Kunja Revolutionary Site
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The Kunja Revolutionary Site is visited by an endless stream of service personnel, people from all walks of life and school youth and children on the occasion of the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 More than 100 000 people visited the site this year with its number increasing in July.
					
					 The revolutionary site in Songchon County, South Phyongan Province is associated with the exploits President Kim Il Sung performed by visiting it several times in the period of the Fatherland Liberation War in order to arouse the working people to the drive for producing munitions in the wartime. 
					
					 In the revolutionary site, there are historic relics showing the efforts and feats of the President who instilled the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance into the working people and showed warm loving care for them.
					
					 There are also materials telling that leader Kim Jong Il made sure that the area was spruced up as a revolutionary site to glorify in the history of the country the fighting spirit displayed by the workers in Kunja-ri during the days of the war.

articles.title: Leader's Loving Care Inspires Army and People to Win Victory in War
articles.content:
Leader's Loving Care Inspires Army and People to Win Victory in War
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- During the hard-fought Fatherland Liberation War (1950-1953) President Kim Il Sung had shown deep trust and warm love for the servicepersons and civilians.
					 He always found himself among the army and people to share bitters and sweets with them and encourage them to work heroic feats in the war.
					
					 He paid deep attention to the health and living conditions of servicepersons and civilians, making constant inspection tours of the battle areas and home front. He even took warm care of war orphans at the Supreme Command.
					
					 In the wartime he took steps to run frontline rest homes for soldiers and enforce the Universal Free Medical Care System and other popular policies.
					
					 Such loving care was also shown for the south Korean people. In the days of the Korean People's Army's all-out attack on the enemy forces in the city of Seoul, he set the morning for starting the attack for security of the citizens and their wealth. In the period of temporary strategic retreat on the part of the KPA, he ordered to float firewood down a river for Seoul citizens.
					
					 Encouraged by Kim Il Sung's loving care and trust, the army and people unanimously turned out in the battles against the aggressors, fully displaying mass heroism rallied closer around their leader.
					
					 After all, the close ties between the supreme commander and the army and people led the young Democratic People's Republic of Korea to the victory in the war against the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats for Victory in Fatherland Liberation War (5)
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats for Victory in Fatherland Liberation War (5)
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- During the 1950-1953 Fatherland Liberation War, President Kim Il Sung showed deep care for servicepersons' health.
					 It was one day in May Juche 40 (1951) that he called a commanding officer of the Korean People's Army to the Supreme Command to discuss measures for health of the soldiers in the front.
					
					 Noting that some of the servicepersons in the frontline areas were attacked with night-blindness, he blamed the commanding officer for not having shown deep care for their living conditions and health.
					
					 Anyone who does not care for soldiers' living and health, except battles, is disqualified for an officer, he said. And he proposed to set up the frontline rest homes for soldiers after taking steps to improve their health.
					
					 After all, rest homes for servicepersons came into being in the frontline areas during the war.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Guides Creation of Literary and Art Works during War
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Guides Creation of Literary and Art Works during War
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung wisely led the work to create revolutionary and militant literary and art works on the basis of his insight into the position and role of literature and art in arousing all people to defend the country during the past Fatherland Liberation War.
					 He set forth the tasks of war-time literature and arts and gave clear answers to the questions arising in carrying out them.
					
					 In the talk "Our Art Should Be Conducive to Early Victory in the War" he indicated the main task of literature and art in the war. He clarified that the task was to fully represent patriotism of service personnel and people of the DPRK who turned out to defend the freedom and independence of the country and thus encourage them to a final victory.
					
					 In such works as "On Some Questions Arising in Our Literature and Art" and "To Raise Our Art to Higher Level" he clarified the tasks to depict the struggle of the Korean people and fully represent the undisputed advantages of the social system in the DPRK and tremendous might of its people.
					
					 He made sure that the work of literature and art was reorganized into a war-time system and writers and artistes rushed to the front to conduct literary and art activities among service personnel and the south Korean people.
					
					 He met writers and artistes in August, Juche 39 (1950) and highly appreciated their activities, telling them to create more works.
					
					 The period of the war witnessed the creation of "Mungyong Pass", "My Song in the Trench", "At the Spring Site", "Song of National Defence" and other war-time songs, short stories, poems, documentaries, feature films, dramas and other works depicting popular heroism displayed by the service personnel and people, their self-sacrificing spirit, conviction in sure victory and optimism.
					
					 The President saw to it that literary and art activities were dynamically conducted among service personnel and people on the front and in the rear.
					
					 The art festival of KPA servicepersons held at the Moranbong Underground Theatre in Juche 41 (1952) fully instilled faith in victory and courage into the service personnel and declared a final ruin to the enemy.
					
					 The people in the rear conducted a dynamic drive for war-time production and assistance, while having brisk mass literary and art activities to greatly inspire the fighters on the front.

articles.title: Round-table Talks Held by Koreans in China to Mark War Victory Day
articles.content:
Round-table Talks Held by Koreans in China to Mark War Victory Day
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held round-table talks in Shenyang, China on July 25 to mark the 61st anniversary of the victory of the Korean people in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					 It was attended by Choe Un Bok, chairwoman of the association, and its officials, Hwang Yong Du, chairperson of the Liaoning Regional Association of the general association, officials of the Korean Youth Association in China, Koreans in China and a consul of the DPRK consulate general in Shenyang.
					
					 Choe Un Bok said that the Fatherland Liberation War was a fierce confrontation between the young DPRK and the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces.
					
					 The heroic service personnel of the Korean People's Army and the Korean people turned out as one in the just struggle for defeating the aggressors and defending the dignity of the country and the honor of the nation under the wise leadership of President Kim Il Sung, winning the victory in the war.
					
					 Then followed speeches.
					
					 The speakers denounced the U.S. imperialists for resorting to the moves for a war of aggression against the DPRK and the Korean nation, far from drawing a due lesson from the bitter defeat they sustained in the Korean War.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to win despite the moves of the imperialists to stifle it as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will together with the people in the homeland bitterly condemn the moves for invading the DPRK by the U.S. and south Korean authorities going reckless to inflict a nuclear holocaust on the Korean nation and will wage a more vigorous struggle for defending peace against the U.S. and war.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the round-table talks.

articles.title: Korean in China Blasts Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
articles.content:
Korean in China Blasts Anti-DPRK Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Hwang Yong Du, chairperson of the Liaoning Regional Association of the General Association of Koreans in China, issued a statement on July 22.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean trigger-happy forces are escalating the tensions on the Korean peninsula, pulling up the DPRK over its exercises staged under various simulated conditions of actual battles to bolster up its capability for self-defense.
					
					 The U.S. is egging the UN Security Council onto kick up much fuss, describing the U.S.-south Korea military drills as "annual ones" and finding fault with the DPRK's routine military exercises.
					
					 World people deride what the U.S. and south Korean trigger-happy forces are doing as shameless provocations reminiscent of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 We always remember the days of victory when the army and the people of the DPRK dealt merciless blows at the aggressors in the 1950s thanks to the gifted strategies and tactics of President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean war-like forces should stop their reckless acts, not forgetting the historical lesson drawn from their defeat in the Korean War.
					
					 The further they escalate their moves to stifle the DPRK, the more significantly it will bolster up all its deterrents for self-defence and the stronger practical retaliatory actions it will take.
					
					 If they dare start a war against the DPRK, we will join the people in the homeland in the struggle for wiping out the aggressors.

articles.title: KBS Calls for Radical Reforms of S. Korean Society
articles.content:
KBS Calls for Radical Reforms of S. Korean Society
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The south Korean radio KBS on July 24 called for radical reforms of the south Korean society.
					 It is 100 days since the ferry Sewol sinking accident occurred, and it happened because of the incompetent "government", irresponsible politicians keen on taking power, corrupt civil servants, and businesses mad with making money, KBS said.
					
					 It continued
					
					 What is most urgent at present is to ensure that the south Korean society is reformed to prevent the recurrence of such a disaster.
					
					 If such reality is allowed to go on, horrible accidents will occur and people will become the victims of the disasters.
					
					 However, a special law for a probe into the ferry disaster has not yet been enacted.
					
					 Accidents of various forms are common occurrences now and the people prone to falling victims to them should rise up in demand of the reform of society, it concluded.

articles.title: MBC Censures S. Korean Regime
articles.content:
MBC Censures S. Korean Regime
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- MBC of south Korea censured the south Korean regime on July 24.
					 It said:
					
					 As soon as the ferry Sewol incident happened, the south Korean political camp loudly advertised as if it were going to radically change the society, but it has failed to enact even a law for probing the truth about the incident although it is 100 days since the occurrence of the tragedy.
					
					 The regime has come under fire for a recent shooting spree in a unit of the south Korean army.
					
					 MBC deplored one cannot but think the regime is too incompetent to describe as a whole.
					
					 Prevailing in society is a strong tendency of classifying people into groups on the basis of regarding ambiguous ideology as a standard and unconditionally rejecting anyone who does not belong to one's group, it added.

articles.title: U.S. Forces' First Defeat in Last Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Forces' First Defeat in Last Korean War
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- In the 1950-1953 Korean War, the U.S. aggression forces vouched that they would emerge victorious, but suffered bitter defeats from its start.
					 It was in Osan in July Juche 39 (1950) that the advancing Korean People's Army encountered the U.S. forces for the first time during the war.
					
					 At that time the U.S. forces hurled into the Korean front its 24th Infantry Division, claiming that their involvement in the war would turn the front situation in favor of them at once.
					
					 Commander of the Division Dean, dispatched the "Smith commandos", comprised of the 1st Battalion of the 21st Regiment and the 52nd Artillery Battalion, as an advance party of the Division to the area of Osan in a bid to block the KPA units' advance into the south. Smith, head of the "commandos", asserted that its appearance in the front would frighten the KPA soldiers off.
					
					 After all, a KPA unit encountered the "Smith commandos" in Osan. The KPA soldiers bravely rushed into the enemy's positions, destroying its artillery pieces and mercilessly attacking the enemy troops. This battle ended in total destruction of the "commandos" in less than two hours.
					
					The first defeat of the GIs in Osan area struck the U.S. military bosses with horror.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Remembered by Papers of Nepal, UK
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Remembered by Papers of Nepal, UK
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- Nepali and British papers carried special write-ups and articles on July 18 on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of demise of President Kim Il Sung.
					 The Nepali paper Arpan carried a special write-up titled "Great man of the century", illustrated with a portrait of the smiling President.
					
					 The paper said:
					
					 The President was the great man and the great leader whom the Korean people acclaimed for the first time in the history spanning thousands of years.
					
					 Born into a family which was patriotic and revolutionary generation after generation, he wisely led the Korean people in their historic struggle for a long time since he embarked on the road of revolution for the country's liberation in his teens.
					
					 He was an outstanding thinker and theoretician whom no one can match as he opened the era of Juche by founding the immortal Juche idea which holds the highest and most brilliant place in the history of human thought.
					
					 He performed great exploits on behalf of the country, revolution, era and mankind.
					
					 And he founded the Workers' Party of Korea, the revolutionary party of Juche type, on the basis of the political philosophy centered on the popular masses and built a state for them.
					
					 He realized the single-minded unity of the whole society with his benevolent politics of love and trust and made great contributions to national reunification and the cause of global independence.
					
					 The British paper The New Worker in an article titled "In memory of Comrade Kim Il Sung" gave a detailed account of colorful events held in the DPRK and worldwide to praise his revolutionary career and exploits on the occasion of the anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Reckless Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Authorities under Fire
articles.content:
Reckless Moves of U.S. and S. Korean Authorities under Fire
 Pyongyang, July 28 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and south Korean authorities should stop escalating the tension on the Korean peninsula by persisting in their anachronistic hostile policy towards the DPRK and confrontation racket against it and ponder over its warnings.
					 Vasile Orleanu, chairman of the Supreme Council of the Socialist Party of Romania, said this in a statement on July 22 supporting the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the statement of a spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 The DPRK Foreign Ministry released the statement on July 19 as regards the fact that the UN Security Council termed the DPRK's regular short-range missile launching for self-defence a "violation of its resolutions."
					
					 The UNSC overlooked the U.S. madcap war maneuvers for aggression and nuclear threat and took issue with the DPRK over its inevitable option to cope with them, an absolutely intolerable act.
					
					 As long as the U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces persist in their joint military exercises for aggression, the DPRK's counter-action will be put on an annual and regular basis.
					
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK in a statement warned that the more desperately the U.S. and the south Korean authorities resort to gangster-like hostile acts, the more deadly retaliatory actions of Korean style they will face. This will be like a bolt from the blue.
					
					 We call once again upon the UNSC to settle all the issues on the principle of objectivity and impartiality, positively supporting the said statements of the DPRK Foreign Ministry and the spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un visita Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un visita Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea. visito a las 10 del dia 27 el Cementerio de Martires de la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria y expreso homenaje a los martires del EPC con motivo del 61o aniversario de la victoria en la gran Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria (1950-1953).
					 Cuando el Mariscal llego al cementerio, el jefe de la guardia de honor de las fuerzas terrestres, navales, aereas y antiaereas del EPC y del Ejercito Rojo Obrero-Campesino dio la orden de arriba armas en memoria de los martires de guerra.
					
					 Fue depositado un cesto de flores a nombre del Mariscal.
					
					 Tambien quedaron colocados cestos y ramos de flores a nombre del Estado Mayor General, la Direccion Politica General y el Ministerio de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares y de las unidades de tipos de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo, del EPC.
					
					 El Mariscal guardo un momento de silencio en memoria de los martires del EPC junto con los participantes.
					
					 Acto seguido, dio recorrido por el cementerio.
					
					 El Comandante Supremo dijo que en la victoria lograda en la pasada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria estan impregnados los meritos heroicos de los martires conocidos o desconocidos quienes participaron con valentia en la guerra para defender la patria en acato a la orden del Presidente Kim Il Sung y asevero la necesidad de respetar a los participantes en la guerra como precursores de la revolucion y glorificar de generacion en generacion su espiritu revolucionario y proezas de combate.
					
					 El espiritu de defensa de la patria mostrado por ellos en la pasada guerra constituye el valioso patrimonio mental de nuestra revolucion, senalo y destaco la necesidad de inculcar en el alma de los jovenes y ninos de nueva generacion y civiles el heroismo masivo y el patriotismo, manifestados por el ejercito y  pueblo coreanos en la pasada guerra.
					
					 El Mariscal fue acompanado por Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y los comandantes de las unidades de tipos de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Coro Estatal Benemerito
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia funcion de Coro Estatal Benemerito
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, junto con los oficiales y soldados del EPC, presencio en el Teatro del Pueblo la funcion del Coro Estatal Benemerito.
					 Cuando el Mariscal salio al asiento, los espectadores le dieron efusivas aclamaciones.
					
					 El Mariscal les felicito el dia de victoria de guerra dandoles la cordial respuesta.
					
					 En la escena se pusieron los coros masculinos "Marcha del 27 de julio" y "Viva el Generalisimo Kim Il Sung", la musica orquestal y serie de canciones "Tributo a los vencedores de la gran epoca", el duo y coro masculinos "El General es gran defensor" y los coros masculinos "Soy tu eterno hijo", "La patria recordara eternamente" y "Fuerzas armadas revolucionarias apoyan solo la guia del Mariscal".
					
					 A traves de la funcion, los ejecutantes elogiaron altamente que las indelebles proezas del Presidente en la victoria de guerra que brillaran para siempre en los anales de la patria.
					
					 Cantaron el hecho de que gracias a la sabia guia del Dirigente Kim Jong Il la RPDC ha venido logrando siempre las victorias en la enconada confrontacion sin canonazos con el imperialismo yanqui.
					
					 Demostraron, con la descripcion artistica llena de temperamento combativo,  que gracias a la genial perspicacia, coraje incomparable y destacada direccion del Comandante Supremo, el ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC defienden con firmeza la soberania de la patria y glorifican siempre la historia de victoria de guerra, iniciada en el monte Paektu.
					
					 Terminada la funcion, el Mariscal felicito a los ejecutantes por su exito.
					
					 Expreso su esperanza y conviccion de que los creadores y artistas del Coro Estatal Benemerito libraran con mas vigor tambien en el futuro las actividades artisticas revolucionarias y combativas y estimularan mas a nuestros uniformados y civiles quienes con la inquebrantable unidad entre el ejercito y el pueblo adelantan la victoria definitiva en la confrontacion antiyanqui y la construccion de un Estado prospero.
					
					 Le acompanaron en verla Hwang Pyong So, Ri Yong Gil, Hyon Yong Chol, Pyon In Son, So Hong Chan, Pak Yong Sik, Ryom Chol Song, Jo Kyong Chol y otros miembros de mando del EPC, los miembros ejecutivos del Comite del PTC en el EPC y los comandantes de las unidades de tipos de ejercito y a nivel de cuerpo.

articles.title: MINREX censura a EE.UU. de nuevas intrigas anti-RPDC
articles.content:
MINREX censura a EE.UU. de nuevas intrigas anti-RPDC
 Pyongyang, 29 de julio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por el reportero de la Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea (ACNC) en relacion con que Estados Unidos y sus satelites pretenden crear un ambiente anti-RPDC vinculandola absurdamente con los problemas de conflicto del Medio Oriente, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 28 la siguiente respuesta:
					 Dicen que hace poco, un tribunal local de EE.UU. sentencio que el caso de "masacre de civiles israelies" cometida por Hezbollah del Libano esta relacionado tambien con la RPDC que hubiera brindado a esta organizacion el misil y otro apoyo militar.
					
					 Por otra parte, la prensa occidental circula una informacion de que entre la RPDC y Hamas de Palestina se impulsa un contrato de venta y compra de misil y equipo de comunicacion correspondientes a cientos de miles de dolares US.
					
					 Esto es un sofisma sin fundamento inventado por EE.UU. persiguiendo el aislamiento internacional sobre la RPDC.
					
					 Tal intriga del imperio norteamericano no pasa de ser una malsana intencion de justificar sus actos criminales que amparan a Israel que en estos dias se halla en la crisis por su masacre de lesa humanidad que se comete en la franja de Gaza de Palestina.
					
					 En la 21a reunion especial del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU, cuando se adoptaba una resolucion en cuanto a la situacion de Gaza, solo EE.UU. hizo voto negativo al documento apoyando a Israel.
					
					 Muy perplejo ante la critica internacional al respecto, el imperio pretende  destinar a la RPDC el foque de censura de la sociedad internacional vinculandola con llamadas "entidades terroristas" definidas por el mismo.
					
					 Ahora EE.UU. acusa al otro pais tildandole la etiqueta de "terror" y "masacre de civiles", lo cual es una logica bandidesca.
					
					 El perturbador de la paz y seguridad del mundo, el caudillo de terrorismo y el autor del terror internacional es precisamente EE.UU. porque entrega a los titeres surcoreanos los armamentos belicos de diversos generos y les empuja a la guerra contra la RPDC.
					
					 EE.UU. nunca puede encubrir ni tergiversar la verdad con cualquier sofisma e invencion.

articles.title: ACNC rechaza ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC rechaza ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y Sur de Corea 
 Pyongyang, 28 de julio (ACNC) -- El vocero  del  Departamento de Estado norteamericano dijo que es "inconveniente" vincular el lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea con el simulacro conjunto maritimo Estados Unidos-Sur de Corea. 
					 Es una sofisteria para desviar la atencion de la sociedad internacional dirigida a sus provocativos ejercicios belicos conjuntos que se libran incesantemente en la Peninsula Coreana y su contorno. 
					
					 Los ejercicios militares conjuntos EE.UU.-Sur de Corea descritos por el vocero del Departamento de Estado norteamericano como "entrenamientos anuales y actos trasparentes" son al pie de la letra para la guerra nuclear de agresion contra la RPDC. 
					
					 Lo evidencian los planes de operacion que determinan el caracter de los simulacros y los medios militares que se movilizan en esos ejercicios belicos. 
					
					 Desde ya hace mucho tiempo, EE.UU. trazo 5 planes de ataque contra la RPDC y vino rectificandolos y complementandolos incesantemente mediante los ejercicios belicos junto con los titeres surcoreanos. 
					
					 El OPLAN 5026 persigue el objetivo de dar el golpe quirurgico para destruir en dos dias las instalaciones nucleares de la RPDC. 
					
					 El OPLAN 5027 fue modificado y complementado sucesivamente como plan para terminar la guerra durante 90 dias con enormes fuerzas armadas y plan de ataque rapido y preciso. 
					
					 El OPLAN 5029 es para hacer frente al posible "derrumbe" del regimen norcoreano y el OPLAN 8022-02 combina el ataque preciso de armas nucleares con el ataque electronico y cibernetico. 
					
					 Segun tales guiones de guerra de agresion pormenorizados, EE.UU. y los titeres surcoreanos libran los ejercicios militares. 
					
					 Esos guiones necesitan inevitablemente los armamentos de exterminio masivo. 
					
					 En efecto, EE.UU. moviliza sin escrupulos los pertrechos de guerra sofisticados con capacidad de exterminio masivo en sus ejercicios belicos de distintos tipos que se libran cada ano. 
					
					 En el presente simulacro conjunto maritimo se incorporan el colectivo de ataque de portaaviones nuclear George Washington y la escuadrilla de buque Aegis Kid. 
					
					 Esto demuestra que es un entrenamiento de ataque nuclear para apoderarse de todo el territorio coreano. 
					
					 No podemos estar con los brazos cruzados ante las maniobras aventureras de las fuerzas hostiles tendentes a invadir y reducir a cenizas nuestro Estado soberano. 
					
					 Es justo el entrenamiento de lanzamiento de cohetes tacticos de la RPDC y son injustos la campana de guerra y la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites. 
					
					 Si EE.UU. piensa en que podria ocultar con sofisterias cinicas su naturaleza criminal y cuestionar las acciones militares de autodefensa de la RPDC, esto es una gran equivocacion. 
					
					 La justicia y la conciencia del mundo reconocen la justeza de las acciones militares de autodefensa de la RPDC y repudian los actos hostiles anti-RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					 La RPDC consolidara de continuo su disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa frente a los ejercicios de guerra de EE.UU. y hara anual y regularmente las acciones de contramedida. 
					
					 EE.UU. no puede impedir con nada el ejercicio legitimo de este derecho de la RPDC.
